Title: Demystifying Disability
Description: "To so many people disability remains a mystery... We don't talk about it. We shy away from it...But its not something that we should do ... disability is a part of what makes people who they are." - Emily Ladau
Alt-Text: Snapshot of the book cover "Demystifying Disability" showing different people with various disabilities

Title: Lived Experiences of Disability
Description: "The Lived Experience of Disability Video Series created by a neurodiverse team of individuals who identify with and without disabilities - provides brief videos to enhance learning for university courses or other professional development opportunities."
Alt-Text: 2 men looking at the camera smiling as they drink a bottle of beer.
